Version 0.0.1
- Fully functional chat system via local networks

Version 0.0.2
- Fixed Bug:
	- Server can't connect anymore client when a client has disconnected [Fixed]
	- Application not disconnected after the application close, except by writing 'QUIT' [Fixed]

Version 0.0.3
- Auto close all client when server are turned off

Version 0.1.0
- Add new feature (The Jidoks!)
  The Jidoks is a feature that give you ability to connect with others by asking and answering question more easily

Version 0.2.0
- A lot of bug fixing, a lot....
- Add more bug

Version 0.2.1
- More bug fixed
- Idk if there's more bug, but i think it should be fine (amen)
